title: Two Boys in Bathing Suits
provenance_text:
John Kane [1860-1934], Pittsburgh, PA. G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA; Mr. [1901-1982] and Mrs. Charles Denby (Rosamond Reed Denby) [1906-1988], Sewickley, PA; gift to Mr. and Mrs. Peter Denby, Sewickley, PA, the 1960s until 1991; by descent to Peggy A. Denby [1933-2014], Sewickley, PA, until October 1996; gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1996.

Updated and Under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: West Calder (West Lothian, Scotland, United Kingdom)
